title: Urdu text do not appear correct in search results
content:
Hello, I have seen a clear difference on the text that appears on the website (e.g. BBC Urdu) and same text in search results. I have tried different search engines (Google, Bing) and different browsers (Edge, Vivaldi) but same issue. Attached are the SS of the issue.

I am not sure if this has to do something with my DeepinOS. But would be thankful if can some guidance what to do? Thanks!
creator: s34k

title: I lost my logins, but autofill keeps working
content: I lost my logins out of nowhere, good thing is that autofill keeps working so I can still log in. I don't really get why it happened, but I would like to recover them. I still have all of my bookmarks and history, etc. When I looked out in the profile folder, I found out that the logins.json file actually has all of my logins (halg of them doesn't have the password, but I guess it's because it's encrypted or something), so I don't really get why they aren't displayed when I open view passwords and logins.
creator: jcfplanck

title: Lost access to e-mail address of my second account
content:
Hello Firefox,

I had been using your browser for a while to use my Gmail on another account. The problem is, the password to my google account was saved by your password saver which was the only way for me to log in. Unfortunately after I installed my new pc and reset my old drives, I can no longer access that password. The account in question is fiendishfamiliar@gmail.com. I have tried countless times to log into my sync account to try and recover the password but apparently I don't remember the password to my firefox account either. I cannot access my Gmail without my firefox account, and I cannot get into my firefox account without my e-mail so I am stuck on a loop. Is there any other way you could let me recover my firefox account? I am on the same network with the same router, if I can't have my account back I won't be able to access important spreadsheets that I cannot recover. Please help me.
creator: peronixtv

title: Autofill
content:
I have autofill off, for EVERYTHING. Does it still autofill my addresses even though it's off and none are saved? Yes. It still autofills my address. Does it autofill my name, and email addresses as well even though those things are completely off? Yes. It still autofills all those things.

So, when something tells you that you might need to delete saved data from your browser cause it might be causing an issue? YEAH I CAN'T DO THAT!

Firefox is just as bad as chrome.
creator: crazyeyecarl

title: Non riesco a disattivare la navigazione nel testo
content: Ciao, non riesco più a disattivare la navigazione nel testo, anche premendo F7, o premendolo ripetutamente, o tenendolo premuto per molti secondi, la situazione non cambia e non riesco più a navigare normalmente come facevo fino a qualche giorno fa. Come posso ovviare? Grazie
creator: marcothewalrus

title: Non-persistent click on menu items in fullscreen
content:
When Firefox is in fullscreen, whenever I click on any toolbar item, bookmark folder or extension, the dialogue box only stays open for a couple of seconds before closing.

A similar behaviour happens when I right click (anywhere): the right-click dialogue box opens but only shows me options related to my extensions (for instance, ublock's "block element...") for a few seconds before disabling this section of the box.


The dialogue box from the item I clicked on only stays open for a bit before abruptly closing without me asking it to do so. Basically, it acts as if I click somewhere else to close the dialogue box, although I don't. The amount of time the box stays open isn't fixed, but rarely goes beyond 2 seconds.


The bug only happens when Firefox is in fullscreen. When it's in a reduced window, the box stays open as long as I do not click elsewhere.

Here is a video recording in which I try to show the bug. On the first half of the vid, I only click once on the items, and the dialogue boxes disappear by themselves. Second half of the vid, FF is in a reduced window, and the bug disappears: the dialogue boxes stay open until I clic

This only happens on Firefox. Even Librewolf and Tor, installed on the same computer, don't have the same behaviour.
creator: firefox.brownsdale

title: Math Context Menu not showing up when clicking equation image on Wiki
content:
Firstly: Happy Christmas, everyone. And should we not type again in between now and next year: Happy New Year as well.

May all the best life can offer be on your path: True Health, True Peace, True Love, True Happiness and True Prosperity. Now and evermore.

And then some.  ;)

The issue: I am trying to copy an equation from Wiki. Normally, Firefox gives a Math Context Menu (Show Math As, Math settings, ... ), but lately this menu no longer pops up. As the equation is of substantial size, I am not looking forward to type it manually in Word ... .

Is there a way to regain this context menu?

Thank you. Sam
creator: Xogroroth

title: Remove phantom bookmark "Amazon.com" from search suggestions
content:
Greetings

When I enter the first few digits of "amazon" the first suggestion is always "amazon.com". That would be nice were it not for the fact that, as a European, I don't have that much use for prices in dollars and imperial measurements. I have bookmarked "amazon.de" but due to alphabetical order .com always comes first. Naturally, I have tried to purge "amazon.com" from my bookmarks but I have been unable to find anything that I could delete. Thus, I am wondering whether anyone might know how this issue might be tackled and I would be much obliged if anyone could help.

Best Regards Felix
creator: warp101

title: How do you change the font color in preview on a Mac?
content:
Under the Tools menu select Show Fonts. You can change fonts, select the size, and the tab with a green box allows you to changes color. There are several boxes across the color set — you might want to look at them.

Ezzee Fonts
creator: rinarowday

title: Cinco horas para funcionar o navegador Mozilla Firefox após a segunda atualização semanal. PERDI MEU NATAL COM ISTO!
content: Graças a uma ação conjunta entre Mozilla Firefox e Microsoft, venho sofrendo de diversos ataques de hacking no meu computador após as duas atualizações semanais que o Mozilla me indica e a última atualização do Windows. Desde então, toda minha reclamação se transformou em retaliação me impedindo de utilizar qualquer coisa no computador. Hoje, 24 de Dezembro, fiquei mais de 5h esperando pra me comunicar com minha família graças à retaliação destas duas empresas. Eu não aguento mais, não aguento! Vocês do Mozilla já foderam meu psicologico nestes quase 6 anos de descaso, banimentos e indiferença com a própria comunidade de usuários e clientes. E eu cansei! É uma promessa isso daqui: EU DESCOBRIREI FUNCIONÁRIOS DESTA EMPRESA E ELES PAGARÃO POR TUDO QUE VOCÊS ME FIZERAM! INDEPENDENTE DE QUAL CARGO, FUNÇÃO OU ORDEM ELES TENHAM, PAGARÃO SIM! A empresa quis foder meu Natal? A empresa quis fazer conluio de hacking pra me fazer ficar com psicologico abalado? Conseguiram e minha resposta não será juridica, nem nada, será na base do sangue! É o que voces quiseram e é o que vocês terão. Acabou toda minha vontade de viver em liberdade hoje, parabéns Mozilla! A partir de hoje o inimigo de vocês sou eu e não se esqueçam, TODOS SOMOS MORTAIS! EU VOU ACHAR VOCÊS, FUNCIONÁRIOS, EU VOU ACHAR!
creator: twittesk
